analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Wallet.confirmERC20 (/unique_chucks/33/0x5f30dca1c90708e8b5b0b047be6b73e4bcae6238.sol#416-429):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(m_txs[_h].to,m_txs[_h].value) (/unique_chucks/33/0x5f30dca1c90708e8b5b0b047be6b73e4bcae6238.sol#421-425)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- m_txs (/unique_chucks/33/0x5f30dca1c90708e8b5b0b047be6b73e4bcae6238.sol#428-429)

Reentrancy in Wallet.transferERC20 (/unique_chucks/33/0x5f30dca1c90708e8b5b0b047be6b73e4bcae6238.sol#391-416):
	External calls:
	- ! confirmERC20(_r) && m_txs[_r].to == 0 (/unique_chucks/33/0x5f30dca1c90708e8b5b0b047be6b73e4bcae6238.sol#406-415)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- m_txs (/unique_chucks/33/0x5f30dca1c90708e8b5b0b047be6b73e4bcae6238.sol#407)
	- m_txs (/unique_chucks/33/0x5f30dca1c90708e8b5b0b047be6b73e4bcae6238.sol#408)
	- m_txs (/unique_chucks/33/0x5f30dca1c90708e8b5b0b047be6b73e4bcae6238.sol#408)

Wallet.transferERC20 (/unique_chucks/33/0x5f30dca1c90708e8b5b0b047be6b73e4bcae6238.sol#391-416) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/33/0x5f30dca1c90708e8b5b0b047be6b73e4bcae6238.sol#400-401)

Wallet.confirmERC20 (/unique_chucks/33/0x5f30dca1c90708e8b5b0b047be6b73e4bcae6238.sol#416-429) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(m_txs[_h].to,m_txs[_h].value) (/unique_chucks/33/0x5f30dca1c90708e8b5b0b047be6b73e4bcae6238.sol#421-425)
